species.name: hoppip
descriptions: It can be carried away on even the gentlest breeze. It may even float all the way to the next town.
It drifts on winds. It is said that when Hoppip gather in fields and mountains, spring is on the way.
Its body is so light, it must grip the ground firmly with its feet to keep from being blown away.
To keep from being blown away by the wind, they gather in clusters. But they do enjoy gentle breezes.

abilities.name: leaf-guard
abilities.effect: Protects against major status ailments during strong sunlight.

abilities.name: infiltrator
abilities.effect: Bypasses light screen, reflect, and safeguard.
